name: Vxperts Aviation
about: Vxperts Aviation, located at Republic Airport in Farmingdale, NY, is a premier flight training institution led by Chief Pilot David Windmiller, a renowned US Team aerobatic pilot with over 18,000 hours of flight experience. The school utilizes the Extra EA-300, a 2-seat aerobatic capable aircraft, to train students in extreme loss-of-control scenarios safely. Vxperts Aviation is dedicated to providing high-quality training, emphasizing the importance of knowledge and skill to prevent avoidable accidents. With a focus on confidence and proficiency, their training programs cater to pilots of all levels, ensuring they are well-prepared to handle any mid-flight issues. Vxperts Aviation is committed to delivering exceptional flight training for a safer and more skilled aviation community.
